title: Problem 2109_C1
statement: This is the easy version of the problem. In this version, you can send at most \mathbf{7} commands. You can make hacks only if all versions of the problem are solved.This is an interactive problem.Welcome, Duelists! In this interactive challenge, there is an unknown integer x (1 ≤ x ≤ 10^9). You must make it equal to a given integer in the input n. By harnessing the power of "Mathmech" monsters, you can send a command to do one of the following: CommandConstraintResultCaseUpdateJury's response"a
